select A.city as dept_name,ifnull(NUMB,0) AS money from (SELECT DISTINCT c.city ,c.id FROM sys_city c ) A LEFT JOIN (select SUBSTRING_INDEX(r.place,',',1) AS TT ,SUM(o.money) as NUMB FROM `rail_prize` r ,rail_prize_opinion o WHERE r.id=o.prize_id and o.rank = 0
and r.happen_time >= #{startTime}
and #{endTime} >= r.happen_time
group by SUBSTRING_INDEX(r.place,',',1)) B on A.city = B.TT ORDER BY A.id

SELECT COUNT(1) as count,a.types as types FROM rail_prize a
WHERE a.release_time >= #{startTime}
and #{endTime} >= a.release_time
and a.status = 8 GROUP BY a.types
